name: Aarya
headerTaglineTwo: I like designing intelligent solutions where algorithms meet empathy.

experiences.title: AI & Computer Vision Intern
experiences.description:
Built an AI-powered MediaPipe eye-tracking system to capture and analyze pathologists' gaze patterns on 500+ digital pathology slides for quantitative insights into diagnostic focus areas and improving model training efficiency by 33%.
Conducted exploratory data analysis (EDA) on 9k+ gaze datapoints per session to identify viewing trends; integrated results into computer vision pipelines, reducing slide size by 30% while maintaining >96% fidelity for clinical review.

experiences.title: Applied ML & SWE Intern
experiences.description:
Developed and deployed a cross-platform iOS/Android app (React Native + Swift), published on the App Store with 68+ testers, integrating an LLM-powered trivia engine that improved accessibility for South Asian Alzheimer's patients.
Analyzed engagement data from 2,200+ patient interactions, tailoring modules to cultural/linguistic needs; integrated gamified metrics (accuracy, time-on-task) into dashboards, improving cognitive outcome evaluations by 22%.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Intern
experiences.description:
Performed EDA on 30k+ daily production records, identifying anomalies and error patterns; engineered Machine Learning features that improved defect detection accuracy by >98%, minimizing reliance on manual inspection.
Built a Python/Django data pipeline on AWS with a React dashboard, streaming daily KPIs in real time; enabled supervisors to make faster, data-driven adjustments, reducing waste by 27% and boosting line efficiency by 18%.

experiences.title: Software Developer (Data-Driven Product Optimization)
experiences.description:
Boosted user engagement by 16% and cut page load time by 23% by building full-stack features (React.js, Node.js, Python pipelines) and implementing immersive Three.js visualizations, improving UX across the platform.
Analyzed client usage data to identify trends and prioritize features, directly driving the acquisition of 12 new clients in Indiana and supporting expansion through cross-functional collaboration and technical advocacy.
